title: Jump'N'Shoot Attack v1.0
description:
A mobile game for gamers! Join Louise Lightfoot, the legendary "Master of Jumping and Shooting", on her mission to save the President of Earth 4 from evil space mutants known as the Xatharr!! Collect items to boost attacks and gain lives, dominate online leaderboards, and JumpÃ¢â‚¬â„¢NÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Shoot your way to victory!

From the developer of Angry Video Game Nerd Adventures and MANOS: The Hands of Fate comes a true hardcore retro gaming experience on your mobile device, with no fiddly virtual controls and no paywalls.

- 16 fast-paced, hard-as-heck platforming levels across 4 crazy worlds!
- Collect items to boost your blaster gun and take to the skies with a jetpack!
- Make your way up the leaderboards for high scores and best times!
- Pumping 8-bit soundtrack from the composer of AVGN Adventures!
- Twitch-reflex two-touch control scheme; never miss a thing!
- Authentic retro visuals and sound will take you back to the past!

This is not some endless runner with no goal in sight. This is a fully-fledged retro platformer with 16 fast-paced stages of adrenaline-pumping jump and shoot action. The streamlined two-touch control scheme is perfect for your touch-screen and the challenge is high with none of the loss of responsiveness you might have gotten from a 'virtual d-pad'.

Are you hardcore enough to save the president of Earth 4 from the Xatharr??

No time to lose, Louise!!
